name: Savage Moon
description:
This action-packed tower defense strategy game takes you to distant planets where you must defend mining facilities from relentless Insectocyte monsters. Build towers in strategic locations in order to fend off wave after wave of increasingly tough attackers. Then use funds from kills and mining to build, upgrade, or research new weapons and technologies to strengthen your defenses. It will take equal parts skill and strategy to survive in Savage Moon™.

Download this action-packed game today!

• Be Strategic - Manage funds and resources to build, upgrade, and research new weapon technologies to bolster your defenses
• Fast-Paced Action - Massive carnage ensues as you fight off wave after wave of giant space bugs with an arsenal of 10 powerful weapon types
• Global Online Rankings - See how your skills stack up against the best players in the world
• Trophy Support - Complete various challenges to earn new Trophies for your collection
